plugin.name: Byteman
plugin.description: Provides a client to a Byteman instrumented JVM

server.name: Byteman Agent
server.description: A Byteman agent that is listening for incoming requests to perform byte-code manipulation

c:simple-property.name: listenerHost
c:simple-property.description: The IP or hostname that the Byteman agent listener has bound to

c:simple-property.name: listenerPort
c:simple-property.description: The port that the Byteman agent listener is listening for commands on

c:simple-property.name: bytemanClientJar
c:simple-property.description: The full path to the Byteman jar file that contains the Byteman submit client

operation.name: getRule
operation.description: Retrieves the content of a given rule

c:simple-property.name: ruleName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the rule to get

operation.name: getClientVersion
operation.description: Reports the version of the Byteman client that is being used by this plugin

c:simple-property.name: version
c:simple-property.description: The version of the Byteman client

operation.name: addJarsToSystemClasspath
operation.description: Adds jars to the Byteman agent's system classpath. Use this if the jar files already exist at the given locations and are accessible to the Byteman agent.

c:simple-property.name: jarPathnames
c:simple-property.description: Comma-separated list of pathnames pointing to the jar files.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: The response from the Byteman agent

operation.name: addJarsToBootClasspath
operation.description: Adds jars to the Byteman agent's boot classpath. Use this if the jar files already exist at the given locations and are accessible to the Byteman agent.

c:simple-property.name: jarPathnames
c:simple-property.description: Comma-separated list of pathnames pointing to the jar files.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: The response from the Byteman agent

operation.name: getAddedClasspathJars
operation.description: Gets the list of all jars that were added to both the boot and system classpaths of the Byteman agent.

c:list-property.name: additionalBootClasspathJars
c:list-property.description: Jars that were added to the boot classpath

c:map-property.name: additionalBootClasspathJar
c:map-property.description: A jar that was added to the boot classpath

c:list-property.name: additionalSystemClasspathJars
c:list-property.description: Jars that were added to the system classpath

c:map-property.name: additionalSystemClasspathJar
c:map-property.description: A jar that was added to the system classpath

metric.description: The total number of rules currently deployed in the Byteman agent
